name: fat_proc_imit2w_from_t1w
author: AFNI Developers
description: Process T1w anatomical images to generate an imitation T2w-contrast image

inputs.description: Full name of the input T1w volume
inputs.name: Input T1w File

inputs.description: Output prefix for files and snapshots
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default: __WORKING_imit2w_from_t1w)
inputs.name: Working Directory

inputs.description: Optional input of a pre-skullstripped T1_FILE (either mask or skull-stripped volume)
inputs.name: Pre-skullstripped Mask

inputs.description: Optional, add in blurring during the 3dSkullStrip part (in mm, default: 2 FWHM)
inputs.name: Skull Strip Blur FWHM

inputs.description: Optional switch to NOT remove working directory '__WORKING_imit2w_from_t1w' (default: remove working dir)
inputs.name: No Clean

inputs.description: Turn off the automatic creation of QC montages (default: on)
inputs.name: No QC View

inputs.description: Change the prefix of the QC images (default: use prefix of volumes)
inputs.name: QC Image Prefix

output-files.description: Volume with T2w-like tissue contrast from T1w
output-files.name: T2w Contrast Volume

output-files.description: Cleaned/processed version of the input T1w volume with scaled skull and noise outside the brain
output-files.name: Cleaned T1w Volume

output-files.description: Skull-stripped version of the T1w volume
output-files.name: Skull-stripped T1w Volume

output-files.description: QC images of the skull-stripped T1w volume and the final imitation-T2w volume
output-files.name: QC Images
